snippet: The Sphinx Virtuosi, part of an organization that encourages performers and composers from minority groups, gave a showcase concert at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by classical music ensemble Sphinx Virtuosi at Carnegie Hall; group is part of the Sphinx Organization, a non-profit that encourages performers and composer from minority groups.
lead_paragraph: The Sphinx Virtuosi, part of an organization that encourages performers and composers from minority groups, gave a showcase concert at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Sphinx Virtuosi Play Piazzolla and Golijov at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: An Orchestra Dedicated to Broadening the Talent Pool
headline.print_headline: An Orchestra Dedicated to Broadening the Talent Pool
